LanguageData.AF_TH_NeedComfort.stages.0.label: <color=#fbef97>Not Comfory~~~</color>
LanguageData.AF_TH_NeedComfort.stages.0.description: It's a good thing I'm furry~
LanguageData.AF_TH_NeedComfort.stages.1.label: Rim，Rim！
LanguageData.AF_TH_NeedComfort.stages.1.description: A Sleeper Cell place like this! I don't have time to sit down!
LanguageData.AF_TH_NeedComfort.stages.2.label: Relax self
LanguageData.AF_TH_NeedComfort.stages.2.description: Ah, it's my own little bench~
LanguageData.AF_TH_NeedComfort.stages.3.label: Extremely comfortable
LanguageData.AF_TH_NeedComfort.stages.4.label: <color=#fbef97>In Luxury?</color>
LanguageData.AF_TH_NeedComfort.stages.4.description: It feels like it's in the clouds, but I'm not happy at all... What was my purpose in coming into this world in the first place?
